title: Riot's Logic Really Doesn't Make Sense Sometimes
body:
We can spam and be rude/salty with emotes... but the "on kill" animations we payed for can ONLY be used in urf mode

In what way are Red Baron Corki, Annie in Wonderland, Surprise Party Fiddle, Magnificent TF, Alien Invader Heimer, and Primetime Draven "legendary skins"?

And I feel like there was something else in this realm of "it doesn't add up" that I've forgotten... (and no, I'm not talking about Graves)
